title: I HAVE THE HELLS ITCH
body:
I went to the beach the other day and got sun burnt pretty bad and now it's itching so bad I can't eveN take it. It's like a million fire ants all over my back and shoulders and it doesn't stop, I want to scratch it so bad but that j'es makes it itch more and more and more...............

Anyone got any solutions for "hell's itch"?? How can I stop the torture X_X

oH GOD i hope this is j'es a 1 day kinda thing I'm goin' crazyyyyyy
